name: Introduction to Physics
description: Introduces students to physics fundamentals and prepares them for more advanced courses.

name: Classical Mechanics
description: Covers Newtonian mechanics and the dynamics of particles and rigid bodies.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Explores the physics of heat and its relation to energy and work, including the laws of thermodynamics.

name: Electromagnetism
description: Provides an introduction to the principles of electricity and magnetism.

name: Quantum Mechanics
description: Introduces the principles of wave mechanics, including the Schrodinger equation and its solutions.

name: Condensed Matter Physics
description: Explores the physics of condensed matter, including crystalline and non-crystalline solids, liquids, and gases.
